God's Faithful

Hidden Jewish communities have organized under oppression ever since the time of the Babylonian captivity. These groups welcome both those forced to convert away of Judaism, the Anusim, and those who have secretly become righteous converts, the ger tzedek. A community always cares for its own, knowing that as ages pass, true faith is worth persevering for. God will provide.
the Loyal Magi

Believing themselves to be the protectors of understanding and knowledge in a world under the spell of Ahriman's ignorance, Zoroastrians organizing in secret spread the truth and light of Ahura Mazda's wisdom. Charged by their prophet with protecting the water, earth, fire and air, they enlighten others about the struggle between destructive chaos and the good of creation. Even when forced into secrecy there is yet hope, for Zoroaster told of the inevitability of Ahura Mazda's victory.
the Oathkeepers

Knowing of the inevitable coming of Ragnarok, as foretold in their saga scriptures, Norse believers will work even in secret to prepare the world for the snowy hell of the Fimbulvetr and the great battles of all-consuming fire it presages. Practicing their secret rituals in the name of the Allfather, they will accept any kind of warrior who can stand with them in the struggle against the chaos and desolation that other faiths seem intent on bringing upon the world.
Perun's True

Their identities marked by hidden axe amulets illustrating their devotion to Perun, underground Slavic curates pray in wild storms, their voices consumed by the thunder. In time they know that those who hunt them will be as powerless against the coming of Perun as the oak is against the lightning.
the Children of Dievas

As children of Dievas, the hidden followers of the Baltic faith know that everything is connected through the divine spirit, even those who oppress them. So it is that they continue their work unabated, spreading the words of the High Priest even among those who are at first unwilling to listen. Through the divine commonality of Perkunas, Saule or Daugava, they believe anyone can find a home with them.
the Riders of the Blue Sky

No matter how far you travel, and no matter what unbelievers say, you are always under the Heavenly Father, and standing upon the Earth Mother. This is how the followers of Tengri can be so certain in their faith that they follow it even in the face of persecution. All they have to do to prove their faith is to lift their eyes towards Tengri of the Blue Sky above, feel the protection nature provides, and let their Wind Horses ride in prayer to a better place.
the Speakers of Ukko

Even under the rule of another religion, the Suomenusko faith lives strong in some people. Communing with nature, they find their gods in the quiet places of the world. Among the trees, the brooks and the light of the moon, where they worship their divine kings in secret. But silence does not last forever, and it will soon be shattered by the storming in of Ukko on his chariot of thunder, his bolts of lightning striking the faithless to ash.
the Spirit Keepers

As preachers proselytize, there are those who play their part, but in secret turn to the forces around them. No other gods have shown them the small miracles of the world, or the sheer divinity of life and existence. They tell each other stories of how faith does not reside in some otherworldly realm, but in the trees around them, the rocks by their feet, and the waters they drink of.
Zun's Living Fire

The secret followers of Zun have little need for foreign faiths. The answer to every theological challenge and every moment of doubt is right in the sky above them, every day, without fail. It is what brings life and hope, deserving of every prostration. Just as Zun never fails to bring warmth to the earth and drive the night away, his followers will rise on the other side of their own long night.
the Society of Jesus

Ever since its humble roots, Christians have marked themselves by their refusal to abandon their faith in the face of persecution. So it is that a rich tradition of martyrs and underground parishes can give hope to groups of believers in even the darkest of times, no matter what they are outwardly forced to profess. To each other they can profess their true faith in God, and their God is love.
the Old Christians

Seeing themselves as walking in the footsteps of the Apostles who first built the Church in the name of Christ, there are Christians who will not give up their faith, even when circumstance has forced them to renounce their words. They continue the good work, building their faith and their church, knowing in their hearts that they are doing God's will.
the Islamic Brotherhood
The Sunnis secretly follow the teachings of the Quran, believed to have been verbally recited to Muhammed by God. They will proclaim that Muhammed is chosen by God, as prophet and the first Imam.
the Party of Ali

The Shiites secretly follow the teachings of the Quran, believed to have been verbally recited to Muhammed by God. They will proclaim that Muhammed is chosen by God, as prophet and the first Imam. They spread their belief that God, through Muhammed, chose Ali as his successor, and thus the first caliph of the state of Islam. They will stand by what they believe to be the true word of god.
Sanatana Dharma

Followers of Hinduism believe it to be The Eternal Way, and even when forced to utter the blessings of another spirit, some know that in the samsara all things will come to pass, and the natural order of things will return. In the cycle of destruction and creation, death and rebirth, endings and beginnings, no other truth will stand victorious for long.
the Eightfold Path

Those who secretly follow the teachings of Buddha focus on asceticism and distancing themselves of worldly possessions as much as they can without notice. A belief in rebirth into the wheel of life and death makes them distance themselves of all cravings, which bring only pain. There are those who would rather plant a good karmic seed through rebirth than renounce these teachings, as an open profession of faith is not always needed to grow closer to Nirvana.
the Harmless

To conquer all inner passions is to become Jina. The Jains take five vows of self- discipline and asceticism in their search of spiritual development. Ahmisa: to love and cause no harm to other living beings. Satya: to always speak the truth. Asteya: to never take that which is not willingly offered. Brahmacharya: to adopt chastity or celibacy. Aparigraha: the renunciation of worldly possessions. To be Jain is to never break such vows, even when doing so is in itself a secret that tries Satya to its very limits.
Embarrassed Believer
This character is recovering from something humiliating.
Unimpressed

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has offered to support me in my secret ceremony. "For a fellow [Root.GetTrueReligionAdherent]", [From.GetSheHe] writes. No, I don't have time for this right now.

I had just lit the candles when [unfortunate_interrupter.GetTitledName] walked in on us. [unfortunate_interrupter.GetSheHeCap] gasped at the sight of our foreign ceremony, but before [unfortunate_interrupter.GetSheHe] had time to alert the guards, [From.GetFirstName] tackled [unfortunate_interrupter.GetHerHim]. The [unfortunate_interrupter.GetManWoman] must've hit [unfortunate_interrupter.GetHerHis] head on something though – when the blood started pouring onto the floor, [From.GetFirstName] backed away in horror.
This is terrible! What did you do?!
Even though an unfortunate accident, the ceremony to [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] is a complete failure.\n

[From.GetFirstName] lights the candles, as I speak the words of prayer to [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]. Hidden in this secret chamber, I can still hear the sounds of people outside. This had all seemed so clever before – now I am wondering if it is worth the risk of being discovered. I sigh and squeeze my pendant tightly, ignoring the rolling eyes of [From.GetFirstName].
I don't need your judgment, [From.GetSisterBrother].
You complete the ceremony, but agree to not talk about it.\n

[From.GetFirstName] lights the candles, and I speak the words of prayer to [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]. I close my eyes as we join hands and bow our heads before the holy symbols on the wall. Performing a secret ceremony, in a secret chamber, I should be nervous, or excited. Or... something. I don't feel much at all? Yet [From.GetFirstName] turns to me afterwards. "Thank you, [Root.GetSisterBrother]. I needed this."
I'm glad for you, [From.GetSisterBrother].
You complete the ceremony, and §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! smiles at you.\n

[From.GetFirstName] lights the candles, and I speak the words of prayer to [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]. I close my eyes as we join hands and bow our heads before the holy symbols, the ones I usually keep hidden behind heavy curtains. This is how it should be – for a moment, all I can hear is the sound of my own breathing, and I feel... safe.

[From.GetFirstName] lights the candles, and I speak the words of prayer to [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]. I close my eyes as we join hands and bow our heads before the holy symbols – the ones I usually keep hidden behind heavy curtains. For a moment, all I can hear is the sound of my own breathing, and I feel... safe. "One day, we'll be free", [From.GetFirstName] says.

[From.GetFirstName] lights the candles, and I speak the words of prayer. I close my eyes as we join hands and bow our heads before the holy symbols – the ones I usually keep hidden behind heavy curtains. I have not felt this relaxed in months. When I open my eyes, I find [From.GetFirstName] averting [From.GetHerHis] gaze from me, blushing.

[From.GetFirstName] lights the candles, and I speak the words of prayer. To my surprise, [From.GetFirstName] takes my hand – the faint light of the room reflected only in [From.GetHerHis] eyes, and the holy symbol hanging from a pendant around [From.GetHerHis] neck. "We're supposed to be praying", I mumble and let go, still feeling the warmth of [From.GetHerHis] hand on my skin.
We should do this again, sometime.
You complete the ceremony, both you and §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! feeling better.\n
You complete the ceremony, and walk away with some new and confusing feelings...\n

I light the candles, while [From.GetFirstName], in a low voice, begins to sing a haunting melody. I bow my head, deciding resolutely that I am a true [Root.GetTrueReligionAdherent] and this will not change. [From.GetFirstName] echoes my thoughts, when [From.GetSheHe] finally speaks: "This ceremony is as much for [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName], as it is for us". I nod, and we join hands in prayer.

I light the candles, while [From.GetFirstName] begins to sing quietly, a haunting melody, in reverence to [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]. I close my eyes, in relief, over being able to practice my faith and to say the words of prayer without judgment. I look over to [From.GetFirstName], who is still singing, and I smile. Kinship such as this, is a gift.

I lit the candles, while [From.GetFirstName] began to sing quietly, a wistful melody. I swear by [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName], I almost dropped the fire I was holding, as [From.GetHerHis] voice struck a brilliant chord in me. It was so beautiful – the hymn, and the [From.GetManWoman] performing it. I shook my head, trying to focus on the ceremony. In my heart, something flickered to life.

I lit the candles, while [From.GetFirstName] began to sing quietly, a wistful melody, full of longing. I've never seen [From.GetHerHim] so solemn before, and I was struck by the admiration that welled up in me. By [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName], I and [From.GetFirstName]? What was I thinking? I shook my head, trying to focus on the ceremony – in my heart, something flickered to life.
It was extraordinary.
You complete the ceremony and walk away with a renewed faith.\n
You complete the ceremony and walk away with a new-found strength, and some interesting feelings...\n

I have received a letter from my fellow member of [This.Society.GetName], [From.GetTitledFirstName]: "Dear [Root.GetSisterBrother] [Root.GetFirstName]. Will you, as the [Root.Religion.GetGroupName] scholar you are, please offer me some advice on my poetry? Or, the attempt of it?" Reading through the attached documents, there are multiple verses, all in honor of [From.Religion.GetHighGodName].
Hmm... I am missing the more comforting aspects of faith.
§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! will receive a letter with your advice.\n
While I enjoy the metaphors, they seem a little forced?
Writing is frivolous.
You can't be bothered with this.\n

I was beginning to think that [From.GetTitledFirstName] took offense to my comments, but today I have received a new draft of [From.GetHerHis] work – I am surprised to find that [From.GetHerHis] words really speak to me. Scribbled in the margin I can just make out: "I implore you, [Root.GetSisterBrother], bear with me. It is not finished".
Nonsense! This is brilliant work and the world needs to see it!
You make sure the writings are published, against the wishes of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
I think [This.Society.GetName] will treasure these words.

Can I keep this?
You find great comfort in the writings.\n
If I were to put these poems out, in my own name...
You decide to steal the writings and take the credit yourself.\n

I cannot believe that you went against my wishes, [From.GetTitledName] writes to me. "The poems were far from finished, and now I receive word that my metaphors could use work? I have been humiliated!" I put the letter away, frowning.

I cannot believe that you went against my wishes, [From.GetTitledName] writes to me. "The poems were far from finished, and now people are saying that perhaps I do not understand the comforting aspects of [From.Religion.GetHighGodName]? I have been humiliated!" I put the letter away, frowning.
Hrmph. You cannot fault a [Root.GetManWoman] for seizing an opportunity.
§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! will understand, in time.\n

I am flattered that you think [This.Society.GetName] could benefit from my work, [From.GetTitledName] writes in [From.GetHerHis] letter. "Thank you for your support, [Root.GetSisterBrother]" [From.GetSheHe] continues, before assuring me of the finishing touches [From.GetSheHe] intends to see to before the final version of the manuscript will enter the library.
I am honored to be surrounded by minds like [From.GetFirstName].

I cannot believe that my words could have such an impact on someone, honored [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]. I place the letter on the mantelpiece, the sigil of [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] a friendly reminder of the comfort I feel.
I am lucky to be a part of [This.Society.GetName].
You feel better.\n

Fascinating! I shall visit the monastery where this feat has been accomplished.

Escorted through the gardens of the monastery, I immediately spot the work of [From.GetSisterBrother] [From.GetFirstName]. The roses are a delicate mixture of red and yellow, a hue of sunset at their center. "They're beautiful", my escort nods, offering me a small spade. "They're a little cramped over there though, would you mind helping out?"
I would love to! There is something... grounding, to gardening.
The [Root.GetSocietyRank] smiles.\n
Oh, I can do that. I think.
You embrace this new interest.\n
Thank you, but no thanks. These are marvelous though!
The [Root.GetSocietyRank] nods at you in agreement – §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! will receive a letter with your compliments.\n
The roses that I had sent for have now been planted in my own gardens, their beauty spreading joy to anybody who passes by them. What a true marvel of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]!
[This.Society.GetName] be praised!
§Y[From.GetTitledName]§! will receive your thanks.\n

It seems that [From.GetSisterBrother] [From.GetFirstName] has received the sample from my garden that I sent [From.GetHerHim]. Today a courier presented me with some elaborate coal sketches of the various rose species [From.GetFirstName] has been occupying [From.GetHerselfHimself] with – included are ideas of new ones, provided we continue to work together.
I am happy to help!
You do [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]'s work.\n

While attending prayer one early morning, I notice my [From.GetSisterBrother] [From.GetFirstName] drowsing off in [From.GetHerHis] seat. Meanwhile, our fellow members of [This.Society.GetName] are deep in their contemplation and do not seem to have noticed yet.
I should wake [From.GetHerHim], before anyone catches on.
[From.GetSheHeCap] looks like [From.GetSheHe] could use a nap...
I think I heard [From.GetHerHim] request a mustache.

I gently prod at [From.GetFirstName], but I get no reaction. Then I shove my elbow into [From.GetHerHis] side, causing [From.GetHerHim] to cough and open [From.GetHerHis] eyes, a flash of anger in them. [From.GetHerHisCap] face turns red as [From.GetSheHe] blinks, the situation dawning on [From.GetHerHim] suddenly. "Thank you", [From.GetSheHe] mumbles, sheepishly.
Think nothing of it, friend.
It seems I saved you from some real embarrassment there...

As [From.GetFirstName] continues [From.GetHerHis] nap, it does not take long before [From.GetSheHe] starts to snore. I discretely edge away from [From.GetHerHim], and when [From.GetSheHe] finally wakes up, it is to the faces of disapproval from [From.GetHerHis] companions. How awkward for [From.GetHerHim].
[From.GetSheHeCap] did look rather comfortable there, for a while...

I scurry off to fetch some ink, before I gently sit down beside the lightly sleeping [From.GetFirstName] and begin my work. It takes a few minutes, but in the end I am more than satisfied – [From.GetHerHis] new mustache is marvelous! For some reason, [From.GetSisterBrother] [From.GetFirstName] does not return my smile when [From.GetSheHe] awakes from [From.GetHerHis] slumber.
What is not to like?

I am sat next to [From.GetTitledFirstName] at a dinner when [From.GetSheHe] tells about a family of [From.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons] which was attacked in [From.GetHerHis] capital, [From.Capital.GetName]. I am sat next to [From.GetTitledFirstName] at a dinner when [From.GetSheHe] tells about a family of [From.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons] which was attacked in [From.GetHerHis] capital, [From.Capital.GetName]. Such senseless violence! My heart aches for them.
They were [From.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons] and only have themselves to blame!

[From.GetTitledFirstName] was visibly moved by the story about the poor family. After our conversation, [From.GetSheHe] became very quiet and only responded in short, half-hearted sentences when spoken to. Just before our departure, [From.GetFirstName] pulled me aside and thanked me for opening [From.GetHerHis] eyes.
I knew we would find an ally in [From.GetFirstName]!

[From.GetTitledFirstName] only scoffed at my story and haughtily claimed that the family, as 'a bunch of filthy heathens', only had themselves to blame. Then [From.GetSheHe] turned to the [From.GetManWomanOpp] on [From.GetHerHis] other side and proceeded to ignore me for the rest of the evening.

Leave the [Root.GetTrueReligionScriptureName] open on a passage about legendary rulers, hoping it will be relevant to §Y[secret_religion_inductee.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n

As I retired to my [secret_religion_inductee.GetChamber], I was shocked to find a copy of the [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] [secret_religion_inductor.GetTrueReligionScriptureName] on my bed! At first, I thought someone had left it there with the intention to frame me, but then I noticed a little note left on top of the open tome. 'I think you will find this interesting. Please, give it a chance. Signed, a friend.'
Intriguing. I guess a little read cannot hurt...
Read the [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] [secret_religion_inductor.GetTrueReligionScriptureName].
Blasphemy! The unholy words shall burn!
Burn the copy of the [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] [secret_religion_inductor.GetTrueReligionScriptureName].
Never! I will hide it where no one shall ever find it.
Get rid of the copy of the [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] [secret_religion_inductor.GetTrueReligionScriptureName].

The copy of the [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] [secret_religion_inductor.GetTrueReligionScriptureName] I found in my [Root.GetChamber] had been left open on a passage on a legendary war and the brave heroes who fought in it to defend the [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] faith. The story intrigued me enough to make me continue reading. Over the course of only a few weeks, I had finished the entire tome.

The copy of the [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] [secret_religion_inductor.GetTrueReligionScriptureName] I found in my [Root.GetChamber] had been left open on a passage on the importance of family, friends and the [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] community. The words intrigued me enough to make me continue reading. Over the course of a few weeks, I had finished the entire tome.

The copy of the [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] [secret_religion_inductor.GetTrueReligionScriptureName] I found in my [Root.GetChamber] had been left open on a passage on the greater questions – right and wrong, the higher purpose, the afterlife – and as I pondered the [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] perspective on these matters, I found myself intrigued enough to continue reading.

The copy of the [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] [secret_religion_inductor.GetTrueReligionScriptureName] I found in my [Root.GetChamber] had been left open on a passage on a legendary [Root.GetQueenKing] and how [Root.GetHerHis] empire blossomed under [Root.GetHerHis] fair and steady rule. The story intrigued me enough to make me continue reading. Over the course of a few weeks, I had finished the entire tome.
I have been blind, but now I see! Never have I read truer words!
Secretly adopt the [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] faith.\n
Reading this has reaffirmed my confidence in my own beliefs.

My spies have brought me some outstanding news! Apparently [secret_religion_inductee.GetTitledFirstName] read the [Root.GetTrueReligionScriptureName] every night and now seems to worship [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName], like we do, in secret. My plan succeeded!
It is time for [secret_religion_inductee.GetTitledFirstName] to join us.
Approach §Y[secret_religion_inductee.GetTitledFirstName]§! and attempt to recruit [secret_religion_inductee.GetHerHim] to §Y[Root.Society.GetName]§!.
This will do, for now.
[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName], I have failed you.

The spies I ordered to watch over [secret_religion_inductee.GetTitledFirstName] have brought me some disappointing news. As far as they have been able to determine, the [secret_religion_inductee.GetTitle] has not read the [Root.GetTrueReligionScriptureName] I left [secret_religion_inductee.GetHerHim]. They suspect the [secret_religion_inductee.GetTitle] has gotten rid of the holy text.
Invite to [From.Society.GetName]
Approach §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! and invite [Root.GetHerHim] to join §Y[From.Society.GetName]§!.
Has not been invited to join §Y[From.Society.GetName]§! recently
§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! approaches §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! with the intent of inviting [Root.GetHerHim] to join §Y[From.Society.GetName]§!.

The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] has everyone's full attention – except mine. My thoughts are elsewhere as I try to ignore [spiritual_gender.GetHerHis] sacrilegious words echoing through the [Root.GetHouseOfWorship]. Suddenly, my concentration is shattered when the stranger next to me grabs my hand and draws something in my palm with their index finger. The holy symbol of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]!
I must follow them once [Root.GetReligiousRite] is over!
Follow the mysterious stranger who drew the [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] symbol in your palm.
It could be a trap. I cannot risk it...
Ignore the stranger who approached you.

I follow the stranger as [secret_religion_recruiter.GetSheHe] departs from the crowd and ventures into a deserted alleyway. As I round the corner, I find [secret_religion_recruiter.GetHerHim] waiting. It is [secret_religion_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]! '[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]'s blessings, [Root.GetFirstName]' [secret_religion_recruiter.GetSheHe] greets me. 'Are you ready to fight for the True Faith?'

I follow the stranger as [secret_religion_recruiter.GetSheHe] departs from the crowd and ventures into a deserted alleyway. As I round the corner, I find [secret_religion_recruiter.GetHerHim] waiting. '[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]'s blessings, [Root.GetFirstName]' [secret_religion_recruiter.GetSheHe] greets me. 'My name is [secret_religion_recruiter.GetDynName]. Are you ready to fight for the True Faith?'
I have been waiting for this day!
Ensure §Y[secret_religion_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§! that you want to join the secret [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] society.
I... I am not ready.
Leave the alleyway and pretend like nothing happened.

I covered my face before [secret_religion_recruitee.GetReligiousRite] and once at the [secret_religion_recruitee.GetHouseOfWorship] I sat down next to [secret_religion_recruitee.GetFirstName]. At the end of the service, I grabbed [secret_religion_recruitee.GetHerHis] hand and drew the holy symbol of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] with my finger in [secret_religion_recruitee.GetHerHis] palm. Afterwards [secret_religion_recruitee.GetSheHe] followed me into a deserted alley where I revealed my identity and invited [secret_religion_recruitee.GetHerHim] to join us. [secret_religion_recruitee.GetFirstName] said yes.
Another champion of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] joins our ranks!

I covered my face before [secret_religion_recruitee.GetReligiousRite] and once at the [secret_religion_recruitee.GetHouseOfWorship] I sat down next to [secret_religion_recruitee.GetFirstName]. At the end of the service, I grabbed [secret_religion_recruitee.GetHerHis] hand and drew the holy symbol of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] with my finger in [secret_religion_recruitee.GetHerHis] palm. Afterwards, [secret_religion_recruitee.GetSheHe] pretended like nothing had happened and I left the [secret_religion_recruitee.GetHouseOfWorship], my quest unsuccessful.
Such a disappointment.

A smile spreads across [secret_religion_recruiter.GetFirstName]'s [secret_religion_recruiter.GetFaceDescription] face. 'Excellent. Then I am honored to welcome you to [secret_religion_recruiter.Society.GetName]. Together we work to bring about the liberation of the true believers and a new era of [secret_religion_recruiter.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]'s glory. You will receive your first mission soon.'
[secret_religion_recruiter.GetSRFarewell], [secret_religion_recruiter.GetFirstName]!
Is also a secret follower of the [From.TrueReligion.GetName] faith.

Lately, I have found myself worrying about my little [GetFromRelation], [From.GetFirstName]. The [From.GetLadLass] is brought up believing in a false god who can offer [From.GetHerHim] nothing but illusions and hollow promises. Perhaps [From.GetFirstName] is ready to be introduced to the true faith?
I shall read [From.GetHerHim] the [Root.GetTrueReligionScriptureName].
No, the risks are too great, for me and [From.GetHerHim] both!
Attempt to induct §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! into the [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] faith.
Do not attempt to induct §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! into the [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] faith.

When my [GetFromRelation] summoned me to [From.GetHerHis] study, I thought it was time for another boring lecture on manners or morals. However, as I enter the room, [From.GetSheHe] invites me to sit next to [From.GetHerHim] and proceeds to read from a thick tome, which [From.GetSheHe] calls 'the [From.GetTrueReligionScriptureName]'. The stories are about kings and queens, '[From.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons]' and the almighty '[From.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]'.

When my [GetFromRelation] summoned me to [From.GetHerHis] study, I thought it was time for another boring lecture on manners or morals. However, as I enter the room, [From.GetSheHe] invites me to sit next to [From.GetHerHim]. With an open [From.GetTrueReligionScriptureName] resting on [From.GetHerHis] lap, [From.GetSheHe] proceeds to explain some 'essential' matters which [From.GetSheHe] says the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] has gotten wrong.
Oh, [From.GetFirstName], please tell me more!
I guess that makes sense. Can I play now?
This is stupid!

I summoned [From.GetFirstName] to my study where I proceeded to read [From.GetHerHim] the [Root.GetTrueReligionScriptureName]. At first, the [From.GetLadLass] was fidgeting in [From.GetHerHis] seat, but my choice of passage was a good one. Soon [From.GetSheHe] hung on my every word, eyes round as the full moon. As I put the tome away, [From.GetFirstName] bombarded me with questions and we kept talking for hours.
I really got through to little [From.GetFirstName]!

I summoned [From.GetFirstName] to my study where I proceeded to read [From.GetHerHim] the [Root.GetTrueReligionScriptureName]. [From.GetSheHeCap] seemed to truly enjoy the story. While [From.GetFirstName] was more excited about returning to [From.GetHerHis] playmates than having a conversation about what I had just read, I think I got through to [From.GetHerHim] in some way.
This is a first step, at least.

I summoned [From.GetFirstName] to my study where I proceeded to read [From.GetHerHim] the [Root.GetTrueReligionScriptureName]. I could tell from the first minute that I had a real challenge ahead of me. The [From.GetLadLass] was fidgeting in [From.GetHerHis] seat and played with [From.GetHerHis] sleeves. However, I was not expecting [From.GetHerHim] to shout at me when I brought up [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]!
I will give this one more try.
It is clear to me now – [From.GetFirstName] isn't ready.

Yet again, I have been summoned to my [GetFromRelation]'s study. [From.GetSheHeCap] is cradling the tome from which [From.GetSheHe] read last time, but today I am not given a lecture. Instead, we are having a conversation about [From.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons] and [From.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]. [From.GetSheHeCap] is asking me questions and patiently listens to my responses.
I think I understand now, [From.GetFirstName].
But this is not what the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] told me!

This time around, instead of lecturing, I tried to have a conversation with [From.GetFirstName] and listened patiently to what [From.GetSheHe] had to say. We discussed [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] and the [Root.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons] at lengths, and in the end it seemed like [From.GetFirstName] understood and agreed with my point of view!
[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]'s truth shall always prevail!

This time around, instead of lecturing, I tried to have a conversation with [From.GetFirstName] and listened patiently to what [From.GetSheHe] had to say. Sadly, even though [From.GetSheHe] was more willing to listen to me as well, [From.GetHerHis] opinions were set in stone. [From.GetSheHeCap] refused to question the things the [From.Religion.GetPriestTitle] had taught [From.GetHerHim].
Induct Into the [From.TrueReligion.GetName] Faith

As someone who has influence over the upbringing of §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!, §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! can make an attempt to secretly induct [Root.GetHerHim] into the [From.TrueReligion.GetName] Faith.
Is not a secret believer in the [From.TrueReligion.GetName] faith\n
§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! will approach §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! and attempt to teach [Root.GetHerHim] about the [From.TrueReligion.GetName] faith.
Enables you to induct children in your court to your true religion by right-clicking their portraits.
Enables you to evoke the sympathy of characters in other religion groups than your true religion by right-clicking their portraits.
Enables you to secretly induct characters into your true religion by right-clicking their portraits.

Enables you to spread your true religion secretly among the inhabitants of a county in your realm by right-clicking its county shield in the county view. If you openly adopt your true faith, these counties will convert as well. This power is available in the Intrigue Screen.

Enables you to openly adopt your true faith. The other secretly religious characters and counties of your true faith in the realm will convert with you. This power is available in the Intrigue Screen.
Power: §YBenedictine Diligence§!\nUpon reaching rank 4, you will be approached by a fellow member of the Benedictine Order who will help you to become more diligent.
Power: §YDharmic Wisdom§!\nMakes you lose wicked traits and gain pious ones over time.
Enables you to become celibate by using decision in the Intrigue Screen.
Enables you to stop being celibate by using decision in the Intrigue Screen.
Enables you to invite a learned ascetic member of the order to your court.

Herald
the Goldsmith
The Crown of Majesty
The hooped crown is made from gold and decorated with foreign precious stones – emeralds, rubies, sapphires and diamonds – the finest ones the size of quails eggs.
Emerald Scepter
This scepter is famed for the unusual amount and quality of emeralds adorning it. The origins of the stones are shrouded in mysteries, the tales are as numerous as the stars.
Sword of Heroes
This ornamental weapon is an impressive sight. The blade is gilded and the hilt is adorned with foreign precious stones, such as rubies and sapphires, and agate cameos depicting legendary warriors.
Crown of Pearls
Every inch of this golden hooped golden crown is covered in pearls of all sizes, complemented by sapphires, as well as cameos depicting religious characters engraved in mother-of-pearl.
Ruby Scepter
This golden scepter, adorned with opals, almandines and pearls, is crowned by an impressively big and lustrous ruby.
Golden Sword
This gilded blade and hilt, while useless in battle, will impress their holders every subject. The pommel is decorated with a single, magnificent emerald.
Crown of Lilies
The mass of garnets and opals are truly made justice by the silver and gilded base of this crown. The model is an open one with four stylized lilies.
Noble Scepter
This scepter signifies its holder's right to rule. The gilded rod is adorned with pearls and garnets.
Engraved Sword
This sword will not bring its bearer much luck on the battlefield, but the adorned blade and gilded hilt is a beautiful sight indeed.

During the last few days, I have overheard the same conversation again and again. Apparently, a most renowned goldsmith is traveling through [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] and my courtiers are prattling excitedly about [smith.GetHerHis] work. Perhaps I should invite this [smith.GetManWoman] and employ [smith.GetHerHis] services?
Nothing displays authority like fine jewelry.
Invite the famous goldsmith to your court.
I have no money to spare for such frivolities.
Do not invite the goldsmith to your court.

The goldsmith, [From.GetTitledFirstName], courteously accepted my invitation and arrived at court a mere week later. [From.GetSheHeCap] has presented me with some sketches of [From.GetHerHis] previous work and several letters of recommendation. I am assured of [From.GetHerHis] skill, although I ask myself just how much money I can spare for a set of crown jewels.
One and all shall see the indisputable might of house [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]!
Spare no expenses and order the most expensive crown jewels money can buy.\n
I will order something impressive, but sensible.
Order crown jewels which are 'impressive, but sensible'.\n
Surely good craftsmanship is the most important aspect?
Order the least costly set of crown jewels.\n
I have changed my mind. You services are no longer required.
Dismiss §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.

I was overcome by excitement and curiosity when [From.GetFirstName] informed me the crown jewels were completed! As I am waiting in my throne for [From.GetHerHis] servants to carry the great box across the room I struggle not to leap up and meet them half-way. When I finally touch the heavy lid, my hands are shaking...
Regalia worthy of a true [Root.GetTitle]!

[From.GetFirstName] has kept me up to date on the progress of the crown jewelry. I knew they were nearing completion, but when the heavy box was brought to me today, I was still momentarily breathless with excitement!
[From.GetFirstName] is truly a master!

A heavy box has been brought before me. [From.GetFirstName] has finished [From.GetHerHis] work and the crown jewels are completed. While I expect no artifact of legends, I am still excited to see [From.GetHerHis] handiwork.
Let us see what [From.GetSheHe] has accomplished...
Dagger of Glory
This dagger, with its gilded blade and heavily adorned hilt, radiates power. Gleaming rubies, garnets and diamonds are placed in swirling patterns along the hilt.
Ruby Bracelets
These golden bracelets are decorated with rubies and engraved pieces of ivory.
Bejeweled Dagger
The finely crafted dagger has a pommel set with sapphires and amethysts. The hilt is decorated with elaborately embroidered patterns in gold and silver threads.
Golden Bracelets
A set of heavy gold bracelets with intricate engravings and filigree.
Engraved Dagger
Intricate patterns and famous poems are engraved into the blade of this dagger. Its hilt is embroidered with silver thread and adorned with opals and pearls.
Silver Bracelets
These heavy silver bracelets are beautifully engraved and adorned with ivory and glimmering crystals.
Celestial Necklace
With its dozens upon dozens of diamonds and sapphires, this necklace is as beautiful as the night sky itself. Its centerpiece is a marvelous, walnut-sized blue diamond.
Necklace of Radiance
When the light hits it, the gold and rubies of this necklace sparkle as if on fire.
Collar of Pearls
Hoops upon hoops of pearls create the base for this necklace. An extra dimension is added to the piece by a dozen pea-sized amethysts.
Heavenly Circlet
This majestic circlet is adorned with golden wings and uncommonly big and lustrous sapphires.
Staff of Majesty
This heavy gilded staff is engraved with scenes from ancient tales and adorned with both emeralds and ivory.
Circlet of the Sun
When light falls upon the wearer of this circlet, the gold and rubies glow like the sun itself.
Golden Staff
This gilded staff is covered in the most intricate engravings.
Circlet of Twilight
The circlet is a beautiful silver hoop adorned with pyropes and pearls.
Crown of Crows
This golden masterpiece is decorated with filigree leaves and vines. A dozen gleaming crows with amber eyes are perched along the top, their wings spread out as if they are about to take flight.
Crown of the Sea
The peaks of the silver crown are shaped and engraved to look like the crest of waves. A dozen pearls are spaced out evenly along the band.
Iron Crown
While this crown is not fashioned out of the noblest of materials, the craftsmanship is excellent. It is decorated with filigree in geometrical patterns, enhanced with pieces of silver.
Hero's Crown
The base of the crown is a heavy golden band, and each peak is shaped and engraved in the likeness of legendary warriors. The centerpiece is a single, gleaming ruby.
Axe of the Ancestors
This gilded axe is engraved with pictures from the ancestral legends. Ambers are set in the handle.
Amber Crown
This silver crown is decorated with engravings depicting the gods and decorated with fine pieces of amber.
Obsidian Axe
The shape of this axe is simple because the material is impressive enough on its own. The head is made from the blackest and glossiest of obsidian.
Engraved crown
This iron crown, while of a common material, is truly an impressive piece of craftsmanship with its detailed engravings.
Ceremonial Axe
A beautiful ceremonial axe set with polished colored stones.

'I am most sorry, my [Root.GetTitle],' [From.GetFirstName] said apologetically. The goldsmith has informed me that the precious metals and gemstones needed to produce the crown jewels I ordered are impossible to find in my own realm. 'I can send a [From.GetManWoman] on an expedition to acquire said materials, although it will be costly.'
Send someone to the end of the world, if need be!
Insist that you shall have the crown jewels you ordered, despite the extra cost.\n
I am not made of money. Do your best with what is available.
Settle for a less luxurious set of crown jewels than the ones you initially ordered.\n
Send [From.GetHerHim] immediately!
Insist that you shall have the crown jewels you ordered, despite the extra cost.\n
Do what you can with local materials.
Settle for a less luxurious set of crown jewels than the ones you initially ordered.\n
the Weaponsmith

My [Root.job_marshal.GetJobTitle] [Root.job_marshal.GetDynName] has told me about a remarkable weaponsmith residing in [neighbor_province.GetName]. [Root.job_marshal.GetSheHeCap] suggested that I invite the [smith.GetManWoman] to my court to see [smith.GetHerHis] work for myself. If [smith.GetSheHe] manages to impress me, I could order my own custom made weapon.
A fine idea, [Root.job_marshal.GetJobTitle] [Root.job_marshal.GetFirstName]!
Invite the weaponsmith to your court.
Our own smiths are capable enough!
Do not invite the weaponsmith to your court.

Once [Root.job_marshal.GetJobTitle] [Root.job_marshal.GetFirstName] had assured that the weaponsmith's craftsmanship left nothing to be desired, I received [From.GetHerHim] in the throne room. [From.GetSheHeCap] introduced [From.GetHerselfHimself] as '[From.GetMasterMistressCap] [From.GetFirstName]' and gestured towards [From.GetHerHis] numerous assistants, who all carried examples of [From.GetHerHis] work. 'Does my [Root.GetTitle] have anything special in mind?'
You can never go wrong with a good sword.
Swords may give more §YMartial§! than other weapons, §YPersonal Combat Skill§! and §YMonthly Prestige§!.\n
You can never go wrong with a good scimitar.
Scimitars may give more §YMartial§! than other weapons, §YPersonal Combat Skill§! and §YMonthly Prestige§!.\n
A lance is what I desire.
Lances may give a bonus to commanded §YMounted Troops§!, as well as §YMartial§!, §YPersonal Combat Skill§! and §YMonthly Prestige§!.\n
I have always been one for axes.
Axes may give a bonus to commanded §YLight Foot Troops§!, as well as §YMartial§!, §YPersonal Combat Skill§! and §YMonthly Prestige§!.\n
I will crush my enemies with a mace!
Maces may give a bonus to commanded §YHeavy Foot Troops§!, as well as §YMartial§!, §YPersonal Combat Skill§! and §YMonthly Prestige§!.\n
A fine bow would serve me well.
Bows may give a bigger bonus to commanded §YMounted Troops§! than lances, as well as §YPersonal Combat Skill§! and §YMonthly Prestige§!.\n

A [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]. I see. An excellent choice, my [Root.GetTitle] says [From.GetMasterMistressCap] [From.GetFirstName] and calls forward the assistant cradling three [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]s in [From.GetHerHis] arms. "I have three examples of different quality levels here. One must determine what one needs and how much one is willing to pay, however they would all serve your Highness well."
I would not go in to battle with anything but the very best.
Order a [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] of the highest quality. This weapon will give you §G+0.75§! §YMonthly Prestige§!, §G+3§! §YMartial§! and §G+2§! §YPersonal Combat Skill§!.\n

Order a [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] of the highest quality. This weapon will give you §G+10%§! to commanded §YMounted Troops§!, §G+0.75§! §YMonthly Prestige§!, §G+1§! §YMartial§! and §G+2§! §YPersonal Combat Skill§!.\n

Order a [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] of the highest quality. This weapon will give you §G+10%§! to commanded §YLight Foot Troops§!, §G+0.75§! §YMonthly Prestige§!, §G+1§! §YMartial§! and §G+2§! §YPersonal Combat Skill§!.\n

Order a [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] of the highest quality. This weapon will give you §G+10%§! to commanded §YHeavy Foot Troops§!, §G+0.75§! §YMonthly Prestige§!, §G+1§! §YMartial§! and §G+2§! §YPersonal Combat Skill§!.\n
Order a [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] of the highest quality. This weapon will give you §G+15%§! to commanded §YMounted Troops§!, §G+1§! §YMonthly Prestige§! and §G+2§! §YPersonal Combat Skill§!.\n
I do not need any frills, craft me something effective.
Order a good quality [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]. This weapon will give you §G+0.5§! §YMonthly Prestige§!, §G+2§! §YMartial§! and §G+1§! §YPersonal Combat Skill§!.\n

Order a good quality [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]. This weapon will give you §G+5%§! to commanded §YMounted Troops§!, §G+0.5§! §YMonthly Prestige§!, §G+1§! §YMartial§! and §G+1§! §YPersonal Combat Skill§!.\n

I was struck with nervous excitement when [From.GetMasterMistressCap] [From.GetFirstName] announced that the [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] was nearing its completion. Today I have received the [From.GetMasterMistressCap] in my throne room. A sturdy box is in [From.GetHerHis] arms, and as [From.GetSheHe] opens the lid, I find it almost impossible to breathe. 'What will you name her, my [Root.GetTitle]?'
This sword will be known as Heartseeker!
The Golden Scimitar!
This lance will be known as The Impaler!
This axe will be known as Cleaver!
The Foe Hammer!
This bow will be known as Silent Wind!
My every foe shall fear Vengeance!
Scimitar of Fortune is a fitting name, no?
My every foe shall fear The Trident!
My every foe shall fear The Ravager!
My every foe shall fear The Bone Breaker!
My every foe shall fear Lightning!
She looks like a Fury, doesn't she?
Scimitar of Conquest!
The Piercer is a fitting name, no?
She looks like a Marauder, doesn't she?
The Shatterer is a fitting name, no?
She looks like an Eagle, doesn't she?

Finally, the [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] has been completed! [From.GetMasterMistressCap] [From.GetFirstName] has brought me a sturdy box which contains the weapon. My hands are shaking slightly as I open its heavy lid...
This is excellent, [From.GetMasterMistressCap] [From.GetFirstName]!

[From.GetMasterMistressCap] [From.GetFirstName]'s main assistant has brought me the finished [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]. There are no engravings or precious materials to enhance it, but the design has some elegance of its own. Looking pretty is not her main purpose, anyway.
I am sure she will serve me well.

[From.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetTitledFirstName]

We are delighted by your decision to join our ranks as a lay member, [Root.GetTitle]. Together we shall strive for the betterment of ourselves and our fellow [Root.GetReligiousPerson]s by following [From.GetMOCode].

[From.GetMOFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
It is a great honor, [From.GetSocietyRank].

I am trying to focus on my training, but [From.GetSheHe] is always there! No matter if I am studying in the great Order library, hid behind piles of books, or sparring with a fellow Assassin, [From.GetTitledFirstName] apparently has to do the same. And [From.GetHerHis] taunts and snide comments! They are driving me mad!
It is time to really determine who the superior assassin is.

Challenge §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!. This might have a number of outcomes, depending on whether you win or lose and how [From.GetSheHe] takes it. You might learn a permanent or temporary skill, get injured, gain a new friend or declare a new rival.
Let [From.GetHerHim] try – I am not easily provoked!
Ignore §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! and focus on your training.\n

[From.GetTitledFirstName] was not slow to accept my challenge. It was a simple one: we would both craft disguises and enter the nearby town at noon the next day. The first person to spot the other, sneak up on them and place a dagger at their throat would be the winner!

[From.GetTitledFirstName] gladly accepted my challenge. We decided to not complicate anything – a duel at midday the following day, a pair of daggers our only weapons. The first person to draw blood would be the winner.
I am ready.
The challenge is about to begin.\n

I was sweating underneath my heavy robe and veil in the relentless noon sun, but this was what my training prepared me for. I kept my eyes peeled and within the hour I spotted another whose gait was incredibly familiar. As I placed the dagger against [From.GetFirstName]'s throat, [From.GetSheHe] laughed heartily. ' A fair victory, [Root.GetSocietyRank].'

We were evenly matched, [From.GetTitledFirstName] and I. We had been at it for... hours? I knew I would not last for much longer, and as a last desperate measure, I fearlessly lunged at [From.GetHerHim]. We fell to the ground and I managed to nick [From.GetHerHis] arm. [From.GetFirstName]'s body shook as [From.GetSheHe] laughed underneath me. 'A fair victory, [Root.GetSocietyRank].'

We were evenly matched, [From.GetTitledFirstName] and I. I did not remember when we had lost our weapons. Now we were wrestling on the ground, neither of us getting enough of an advantage, sweat soaking our clothes and stinging our eyes. 'Draw?' I breathed. 'Alright, draw,' [From.GetFirstName] chuckled in response.

I was sweating underneath my heavy robe and veil in the relentless noon sun. Where was [From.GetTitledFirstName]? I scanned the crowd nervously, but nothing. And then – the coolness of a blade against my throat. 'Impressive disguise, [From.GetSocietyRank]. I mean it,' [From.GetFirstName] chuckled and gave me a hearty pat on the back.

We were evenly matched, [From.GetTitledFirstName] and I. I had to try my very hardest to keep [From.GetHerHim] at bay. A droplet of sweat fell into my eye, and as I instinctively raised my hand to wipe it away, [From.GetFirstName] lunged and nicked my arm as we fell. 'Good match, [From.GetSocietyRank],' [From.GetSheHe] chuckled and rolled over on [From.GetHerHis] back.
We should do this again, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName].
[From.GetFirstName], you... you are marvelous.
You realize that you had a crush on §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! all along and profess your feelings.
Now we both know who the best is.
Tell your fellow assassins about how you won over §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n

I was sweating underneath my heavy robe and veil in the relentless noon sun, but this was what my training prepared me for. I kept my eyes peeled and within the hour I spotted another whose gait was incredibly familiar. As I placed the dagger against [From.GetFirstName]'s throat, [From.GetSheHe] cursed my name.

We were evenly matched, [From.GetTitledFirstName] and I. We had been at it for... hours? I knew I would not last for much longer, and as a last desperate measure, I fearlessly lunged at [From.GetHerHim]. We fell to the ground and I managed to nick [From.GetHerHis] arm. [From.GetFirstName] cursed me loudly as [From.GetSheHe] pushed my body of [From.GetHerHis].
Who is the master now, you [GetRootFromInsult]!
Punish §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
I am bigger than this.
Now that you have won over §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!, go back to ignoring [From.GetHerHim].\n

I was sweating underneath my heavy robe and veil in the relentless noon sun. Where was [From.GetTitledFirstName]? I scanned the crowd nervously, but nothing. And then – the coolness of a blade against my throat. 'Who laughs now, [Root.GetFirstName]?' [From.GetFirstName] whispered before slashing the dagger across my shoulder.

We were evenly matched, [From.GetTitledFirstName] and I. I had to try my very hardest to keep [From.GetHerHim] at bay. A droplet of sweat fell into my eye, and as I instinctively raised my hand to wipe it away, [From.GetFirstName] lunged and slashed the blade across my dagger hand with a triumphant shout.
I will kill that [GetRootFromInsult]!

I could read [From.GetFirstName]'s answer in [From.GetHerHis] eyes as soon as the words had escaped my lips and my heart sank like a stone. It took [From.GetHerHim] a moment to recollect [From.GetHerselfHimself]. 'I am flattered, [From.GetFirstName]. Really, I am. But... I do not feel the same way. I'm sorry. Let us be friends?'

For a moment, the world stood still. I could not breathe. Then the most radiant, heart-warming smile spread across [From.GetFirstName]'s [From.GetFaceDescription] face. 'I thought you would never ask, [Root.GetFirstName].'
I am honored to be your friend, [From.GetFirstName].
I... I don't think I can do that.
Oh, my [GetRootFromCompliment]!

I have found out that my superior, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName], has a guilty pleasure. Despite [From.GetHerHis] sober appearance, when no one is watching, [From.GetSheHe] feasts on wine and treats. I have requested a meeting with [From.GetHerHim] and dropped a hint about my recently acquired knowledge. How should I use it to my advantage?

I have found out that my superior, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName], has a guilty pleasure. [From.GetSheHeCap] is a slave to [From.GetHerHis] carnal passions – I saw [From.GetHerHim] together with [lover_of_target.GetTitledFirstName] myself. I have requested a meeting with [From.GetHerHim] and dropped a hint about my recently acquired knowledge. How should I use it to my advantage?

A while ago, I noticed the frail nature of my superior, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]. People whisper about the [GetRootFromInsult], but no one has dared to draw any attention to the matter. However, for all [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] knows, maybe there is a plot in the workings! I could blackmail [From.GetHerHim] to get what I want.
I will request a promotion.
I want some of his influence.
I will win [From.GetHerHis] trust by a promise to be on [From.GetHerHis] side.

While the uninitiated might believe that assassins always operate on their own, this is rarely the case. That being said, we are often occupied with our own, equally important, missions. [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] has asked for my help assassinating [assassin_quest_target.GetTitledFirstName], however I am unsure if I can spare the time...
Help me end [my_quest_target.GetTitledFirstName] and you shall have my blade.
Pull some strings for me, and I'll help you.
Anything for a friend, [From.GetFirstName]!
I am sorry, I am too occupied.

They are all staring at me, whispering behind my back! As I turn my head towards them, they look away, but I am sure of it. They know. Perhaps not the specifics, but they know. They will come for me, any day now. Being one of [Root.Society.GetName] always felt worth the risk, but I am not so sure anymore...

Some days, I think I am going insane. It is probably all in my head, but sometimes I notice people staring at me. When my courtiers whisper it is impossible to shake the suspicion that it might be about me. Being one of [Root.Society.GetName] always felt worth the risk, but I am not so sure anymore...
How long before I crack under the pressure?

The last few months have been tough, so when I was invited to the home of [From.GetTitledFirstName] for a small ceremony, it felt like a gift from [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]. [From.GetHerHisCap] words about staying brave and the importance of community touched me deeply. I mentioned this after the ceremony was over, and we ended up talking for hours.
Thank you. Now I realize I am not alone.
I feel as if there is a special connection between us, [From.GetFirstName].
Listening to the words of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! touched you deep, deep down. Confess your romantic feelings to [From.GetHerHim].
Thank §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! for [From.GetHerHis] unwavering friendship.

You rarely find a more devoted follower of [From.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] than my fellow [From.GetTrueReligionPerson], [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]. [From.GetHerHisCap] inability to tell a good lie is a danger to [From.GetHerselfHimself] as well as [From.Society.GetName].

[From.GetHerHisCap] tendency to trust just about anyone is a danger to [From.GetHerselfHimself] as well as [From.Society.GetName].

I shall offer [From.GetFirstName] my help!
You approach §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! and offer [From.GetHerHim] your help in dealing with [From.GetHerHis] struggles to keep [From.GetHerHis] true religion hidden.
My assistance does not come for free.

You approach §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! and offer [From.GetHerHim] your help in dealing with [From.GetHerHis] struggles to keep [From.GetHerHis] true religion hidden in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!.
I have my own problems to deal with.
Do not offer §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! any help.\n

[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] approached me the other day with a somber look upon [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetFaceDescription] face. [From.GetSheHeCap] told me [From.GetSheHe] was worried about my honesty. 'Normally, it is a fine quality in a [Root.GetTrueReligionPerson], but you ought to be more careful.' [From.GetFirstName] offered to help me become a better liar.

[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] approached me the other day with a somber look upon [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetFaceDescription] face. [From.GetSheHeCap] told me [From.GetSheHe] was worried about my angry outbursts. 'If you lose your head, you can put all of us in danger. You never know who might hear you!' [From.GetFirstName] offered to help me manage my anger.

[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] approached me the other day with a somber look upon [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetFaceDescription] face. [From.GetSheHeCap] told me [From.GetSheHe] was worried about my occasional sloppiness. 'Normally, I would not dare to criticize, but I fear your tendency to forget things here and there is a threat our secret.' [From.GetFirstName] offered to help me become more attentive.

[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] approached me the other day with a somber look upon [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetFaceDescription] face. [From.GetSheHeCap] told me [From.GetSheHe] was worried about my trustful nature. 'Normally, it is a fine quality in a [Root.GetTrueReligionPerson], but you ought to be more wary.' [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] approached me the other day with a somber look upon [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetFaceDescription] face. [From.GetSheHeCap] told me [From.GetSheHe] was worried about my indiscreet behavior. 'Our secret is not easy to keep, but all of our lives depend on it, [Root.GetFirstName].' [From.GetFirstName] offered to help me become more aware of my actions.
I will accept [From.GetHerHis] thoughtful offer.

your visibility and risk of discovery decreasing.\n
you failing to learn anything.\n
I think it might be worth a try.
§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! will attempt to help you hide your true religion in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!.\n
Nonsense! I am doing just fine.

[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] listened to my concerns and agreed to accept my help. Since then, we have met a few evenings each week to work on [From.GetHerHis] flaws together. It has been a struggle, but [From.GetFirstName] has been a diligent student and I am most pleased with [From.GetHerHis] development!
The visibility and risk of discovery of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! decreases.\n

[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] listened to my concerns and agreed to accept my help. Since then, we have met a few evenings each week to work on [From.GetHerHis] flaws together. I knew it would not be easy, but despite our hardest efforts, [From.GetSheHe] has not made much progress.
I expected more from [From.GetHerHim].
When I approached [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] [From.GetSheHe] simply dismissed my concerns. I plead to [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] to keep the fool in check and all of us safe!

Since our conversation a few weeks ago, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] and I have met a few evenings each week. It has been a struggle, I cannot deny that, but in the end it was all worth it. [From.GetFirstName] is proud of my development and I am relieved to no longer be a danger to [Root.Society.GetName].
I thank you for your help and patience, [From.GetFirstName].
Your visibility and risk of discovery has decreased.\n

Since our conversation a few weeks ago, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] and I have met a few evenings each week to work together. It has been a struggle. I have tried my very best, but can I deny that which is in my nature? Did not [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] create me like this?
I hope [From.GetFirstName] isn't too disappointed with me.
§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! and [From.GetHerHis] accomplices sets out for §Y[Root.GetName]§!.

To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

It has come to our attention that you no longer adhere to the true faith. As defending the Shia Religion and its followers is the reason why exist, our foremost duty, this is an act of the highest degree of treachery. If you want to keep your life, never cross our path again. 

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

It has come to our attention that you no longer adhere to the true faith. While we hope you will realize your grave error and return to [From.Religion.GetHighGodName], we cannot be lenient. You are banned from [From.Society.GetName].

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

It has come to our attention that you have publicly embraced the [From.TrueReligion.GetName] faith. While your devotion is admirable, it has put you in a perilous position and we can no longer remain in contact with you.

[From.GetSRFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

It has come to our attention that you no longer adhere to the true faith. While we hope you will realize the grave errors of your ways and return to [From.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName], we cannot be lenient. We must protect our own. If you betray our secrets, we will drag you down with us.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
Seems like I made some enemies today.
You no longer fulfill the requirements for joining [From.GetName].

What if I told you that all you have been taught to believe in is a lie? [satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName] continues, throwing a cautious glance around us before pulling up [satanists_recruiter.GetHerHis] sleeve, revealing a scar in the shape of [satanists_recruiter.GetDWDevil]'s mark. "[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] is a liar. Reject the Tyrant deity and let [satanists_recruiter.GetDWDevil] guide your steps..."

I found some cryptic scrawlings written in blood on my bedroom door this morning. The guards say they haven't seen anyone enter during the night and I dare not ask my [Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName] to decipher it. Yet, I think I understand... The mark of [satanists_recruiter.GetDWDevil]...
You carve [satanists_recruiter.GetDWDevil]'s mark into your arm, just like the one §Y[satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§! showed you.\n

You're well aware that a duel with [From.GetTitledFirstName] is a great challenge, but you step up to it and the fight begins. A crowd has gathered to witness the event, and you have no idea if their deafening cheers are meant for you or your opponent. The commotion is overwhelming, and you quickly find yourself without a sword, your hand badly cut and unable to grasp the weapon to continue the duel. You try pleading for mercy, but get but nothing but silence in reply as [From.GetTitledFirstName] raises [From.GetHerHis] sword to your throat and stabs. While you fade from this world the last thing you hear is the cheering crowd.
the four Purusarthas

To complete this mission, select §Y'Donate to Charity'§!.

My wish to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson] has led me to [Root.GetMOCode]. My attempts to follow in the footsteps of [Root.GetMOSaint] has led me to realize the sinful nature of my lusts. I will try to see [Root.GetMenWomenPreference] for who they are, and not simply objects of my desire, from now on.

Finally, a new era of righteousness has begun. For many years we have worked in the shadows, but the rumors are no longer whispered. The name of 'Hassan-i Sabbah', the conqueror of our mountain fortress of Alamut, is known throughout [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] and beyond. The faithful and meek shall find shelter under our wings while the impious and infidels shall fear our fury!

News of our Order's successful occupation of the mountain fortress of Masyaf in Syria is spreading. Our enemies, the infidels and the impious, have begun to realize what they are dealing with. May they cower in fear!

With the fall of our last fortress, our Order has been forced into hiding. Some may think this is the end, but they are fools. We have worked from the shadows before and will do so again. One day we shall rise again, mightier than ever!
This setback will not be the end of The Assassins!

This is a dark day, indeed. Our righteous order has suffered an enormous setback. All of our mountain fortresses and hideouts have been found and burnt to the ground. The few members who survived the infidels' onslaught are hiding amongst enemies, always in danger. While an era has ended and even though our former glory might never be restored, we shall never give up.

Praised be Allah! The Assassins will never be broken! We have suffered in the shadows for many years, but now, a new era begins. We rebuilt our strength and recaptured the mountain fortresses of old. Our enemies will sleep with one eye open from now on...

Found Religious Cult
Create a following enabling you to sow seeds of the true faith in the darkness until you have enough followers to emerge from the shadows.
Falsely Confess Faith
Confess to your liege's faith for political reasons while still practicing your true faith in private.
Convert to your liege's faith
[Root.Society.GetNameCap] has gathered enough support in the realm
All sympathizers of the true faith will be encouraged to openly express their beliefs
Openly Adopt Faith
The followers of [Root.Society.GetNameCap] has for too long lurked in the shadows. The time has finally come to reveal our true beliefs now that we are so many that we can no longer be ignored.

The time has come! [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] believes our secret community of faithful has grown strong enough to no longer need to hide in the shadows. It is time to profess to the entire realm that I am a true follower of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName], standing proud with my [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] brothers and sisters!
At last!

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has revealed an astounding secret. [From.GetSheHeCap] is a [From.GetTrueReligionAdherent], and [From.GetSheHe] is not alone among the nobility of our realm. I have long held an interest in the practices of [From.TrueReligion.GetName] believers, and [From.GetFirstName] has encouraged all those who hold true faith in their heart to profess.
Welcome me into your arms, [From.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]!
I wish to understand the [From.TrueReligion.GetName] faith, but it is still wrong.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has revealed a shocking truth. [From.GetSheHeCap] is a [From.GetTrueReligionAdherent], and [From.GetSheHe] is not alone among the nobility of our realm. For years they have been building communities of adherents to their faith, and there are even places in my own lands where most of the populace prays to [From.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]!
How did they keep it secret for so long?

While [From.GetTitledFirstName] has always been a little strange, I never could have known that [From.GetSheHe] was secretly a [From.GetTrueReligionAdherent]! Along with a community of other nobles in my realm who have been harboring infidel beliefs for years, [From.GetSheHe] has now openly professed to what [From.GetSheHe] dares call 'the true faith.'
There suddenly seems to be an awful lot of these [From.TrueReligion.GetName]s...

While there are only a handful of them, there are a few people in [target_province.GetName] who by the grace of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] are willing to attend our hidden [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] sermons. It will take a long time, but they will become true converts, and will be able to spread our message to ever more new believers. One day we will openly join together in our faith, without fear of persecution.

With the passing of [target_province.GetName] from our realm, my fellow believers and I are finding it to be more challenging than ever to spread the word of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] there.\nPeople seemed to be listening, but for now our efforts must be abandoned until we find a new opportunity.

Our effort to establish a community of [Root.GetTrueReligionAdherent]s in [target_province.GetName] has proven far easier than I thought. The populace seems unusually receptive to the word of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName], and as the congregation grows in number, so does its influence. We may have a self-sustaining community of believers sooner than we thought.
[target_province.GetName] is blessed by [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]!

Our effort to establish a community of [Root.GetTrueReligionAdherent]s in [target_province.GetName] is going well. As the congregation grows in number, so does its influence, and more people turn to the faith.
We continue in [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]'s name.

Our effort to establish a community of [Root.GetTrueReligionAdherent]s in [target_province.GetName] is not working out. The preachers I have given charge of the congregation to are struggling to attract new believers, and without growth even some of our early converts are starting to harbor doubts.
I will provide all the support they require.
We should abandon our efforts in [target_province.GetName] for now.

After much work, dedication and prayer, the community of [Root.GetTrueReligionAdherent]s in [target_province.GetName] has grown far larger than what it once was. Believers in great numbers share joy and hardships while ensuring their faith stays hidden from the wider world. The congregation has become a small cosmos of faithful, and new converts find the truth of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] by the day.
You all rest in the embrace of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]!

[Root.GetSRGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

Our community is growing steadily in the shadows, but for our ultimate goal to see the light of day we need to have the support of the local populace. You should spread our teaching in the lands of [target_province.GetName].

[Root.GetSRFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
